content: Christian Weinert - Royal Holloway Research Portal Christian Weinert Dr Lecturer in Information Security, Department of Information Security https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4906-6871 Phone01784917659EmailChristian.Weinertrhul.acuk TW20 0EX Personal profile Personal profileChristian Weinert is a Lecturer (Assistant Professor) in the Department of Information Security at Royal Holloway, University of London. Before, he was a postdoctoral researcher (2021/09 – 2022/02) and doctoral researcher (2016/09 – 2021/08) in the Cryptography and Privacy Engineering Group (ENCRYPTO) at TU Darmstadt. His research area is privacy-enhancing cryptography with a focus on applications such as private set operations, private information retrieval, federated learning, and AI/ML inference. During his bachelor and master studies, he worked in the area of secure long-term archiving. Christian is recognised as a Fellow of the Higher Education Academy (FHEA).
